TowerDefense
Class TowerDefenseControl

java.lang.Object
  Game
      TowerDefense.TowerDefenseControl

public class TowerDefenseControl
extends Game

Controls the Tower Defense game and the components and functions associated with it (creeps, towers, score, etc.). The stage is read in through a file of specific parameters.

getOptionsPanel

public javax.swing.JPanel getOptionsPanel()
Returns a panel of options for the game. Contains a combobox for difficulty setting and one for time between each wave.
